sentences.sentence: The only wealth in this world is children – more than all the money, power on earth. You are my treasure.
sentences.translation: 世上唯有子女是财宝，人间财权难以比拟。你们是我的至宝！

sentences.sentence: By its very nature, history is always a one-sided account.
sentences.translation: 就其本质而言，历史始终是一面之词。

sentences.sentence: The rest of the world may follow the rules, but I must follow my heart.
Great generals win campaigns, but it is the unknown soldier who wins the war.
sentences.translation: 伟大的将军赢得战役，但打赢战争的却是无名战士。
